commit.message: SO-4025: implement set compare for simple map type reference sets
SO-4025: count as changed when only the source is equal
SO-4025: support search by map target type
SO-4025: support to compare any type of sets

Revert "SO-4025: support to compare any type of sets"

This reverts commit 7d31911f91e2a1fec27249d0734171f45cf1a650.
SO-4025: support to compare any type of sets
SO-4131 Generic mapping domain object updated.
SO-4131: add request that finds every code system in every repository
SO-4131: add test cases for the new all code system searcher request
SO-4131: add map group and priority field
SO-4131: add map rule and advice fields
SO-4025: add number for compare result

nodes.bodyText: ⚠️ Incorrect license. Please use the Apache 2.0 license.

Make this class final.
Rename it to ConceptMapCompareResult.
What can be T here?
This is too generic, and it won't work well in REST APIs with Swagger.
Either we create abstract superclass with T type parameter and concrete implementations for each possible T type (like CollectionResource) or introduce a generic interface for type T.
Simplify if block to inlined return value expression.
Simplify if block to inlined return value expression.
Fields should be final and private.
Make sure you defensive copy the incoming Collection-like parameters with the Immutable*.copyOf() equivalent.
Rename this to SnomedMapTypeReferenceSetCompareTest.
Why do you need this? Also, this uses the same value as the TEMPLATE_NUMBER constant.
Typo!

Simplify test cases by reducing the size of the build phase in each test.
You could extract common set of test fixtures to build methods or to constants.
Possible NPE here, use Objects.equals instead.

Never ever put conditional blocks into filterBy methods.
Handle all these in the actual Request implementation instead.
Not sure if these are actually needed.
This way we cannot filter reference sets where the mapTargetComponentType is UNSPECIFIED.
Null values are the only values that do NOT generate actual clauses in search requests.
Please refactor.
Too complex boolean expression, invert it to make it more readable.

commit.message: SO-4025: move concept map compare tests to core
SO-4025: add request for concept map compare
SO-4025: fix filter by map target component type request
SO-4025: use unspecified number for component URI
SO-4025: add simple type reference set compare request tests
SO-4025: remove deleted package from MANIFEST

nodes.bodyText: Rename prepareSearchCodeSystemsInAllRepositories() method to prepareSearchAllCodeSystems().
Change this to assertThat(codeSystems).hasSize(2) or swap arguments to match expected and actual values.
This is a separate test case, please move it to its own test method.
Make sure you create a CodeSystem before filtering, so there won't be any issues in the future when we remove the default SNOMEDCT CodeSystem.
Make this class final and package private.
Replace limit 50 with codeSystemList.size().
Make this class final.
Rename prepareSearchMappings to prepareSearchConceptMapMappings
Use public final instead of final public.
Rename this to ConceptMapMapping.

Rename this to SnomedConceptMapSearchRequestEvaluator.

commit.message: SO-4025: make class final and package private
SO-4025: set limit to all results
SO-4025: use public final instead of final public
SO-4025: use assertThat instead of assertEquals
SO-4025: use assertThat instead of assertEquals
SO-4025: make class final and methods private
SO-4025: create method to get the map type refset types
SO-4025: use the static method to get the map type refset types
SO-4025: search for simple and description type refsets as well
